desc: Our Molecular Technology straightens hair while nourishing the hair safely, which may last up to eight months! Its non-damaging formula is non-toxic for both Professionals & Customers. Some say it smells like toffee, that's because it's 100% plant-based with 0%formaldehyde, bringing you the future of hair straightening

layout.text: Our molecular technology called Nanoplasty straightens hair by adequately penetrating the hair’s Microfibril Matrix without opening the Cuticle, making the application a highly effective & less invasive non-damaging system.
